data.title: Welcome to the home of TV's Wheeler Dealer
data.meta_description: Mike Brewer is a well-known presenter of television motoring programs including Discovery Channels Wheeler Dealers and World's Greatest Cars
data.meta_site_name: Mike Brewer TV - The Wheeler Dealer
data.text:
Mike continues to make motoring shows all over the world with 2020 seeing the premiere of Wheeler Dealers Dream Car with Marc ‘Elvis’ Priestley, and Mike Brewer’s World of Cars. Even in the Covid-19 lockdown, Mike was still creating new shows, filming World’s Greatest Cars for Discovery TV, which will appear on Quest, and starting his own live chat show via the internet.

He just can’t stop talking about cars. Despite hosting the world’s most watched motoring show, Mike hasn’t forgotten his car trader roots and owns two Mike Brewer Motors dealerships, as well as constantly saving classics by adding them to his growing personal collection.

Mike continues to make motoring shows all over the world with 2020 seeing the premiere of Wheeler Dealers Dream Car with Marc ‘Elvis’ Priestley, and Mike Brewer’s World of Cars. Even in the Covid-19 lockdown, Mike was still creating new shows, filming World’s Greatest Cars for Discovery TV, which will appear on Quest, and starting his own live chat show via the internet.

He just can’t stop talking about cars. Despite hosting the world’s most watched motoring show, Mike hasn’t forgotten his car trader roots and owns two Mike Brewer Motors dealerships, as well as constantly saving classics by adding them to his growing personal collection.

Mike Brewer Motoring is a new motoring community, bringing classic, used and modern motoring together.

TV’s ‘Wheeler Dealer’ and journalist Mike Brewer has brought together a group of experts from the motoring world to create a platform that embraces all styles and tastes from classics to used and brand new cars.

Nothing in the market currently brings all these elements together in a way that is easy to access, available to all ages and doesn’t separate by status or social economic standing.
